model.name: LVxNBA Knit Jacket
model.disambiguatingDescription: This casual knitted piece showcases the season's NBA theme. Crafted in a regular fit from a technical-wool blend, it is signed on the front with the NBA logo in colored intarsia. The back is embellished with the collection's new LV Court signature, inspired by basketball tactical diagrams. Knitted ribs and horn buttons complete the effect.

additionalProperty.name: detailedDescription
additionalProperty.value:
• 50% Nylon, 38% Viscose, 12% Wool
  • Black
  • Regular Fit
  • Model wears a FR M size
  • Model measurements : chest 36’’ / 92 cm, height 6'2’’ / 188 cm
  • Made in Italy
